fulltext:
Toan Le 
Software Engineer in Data 
📱 +84 934635583 
 📧 toan.lee@outlook.com 
     toan.le.bao 
Summary 
I have a solid understanding of many backend technical subjects, especially in microservices and data processing. I 
love to be creative and inventive but trying to keep everything simple “stupid”. I have over 8 years of experience in 
the field. More documentation of experience, references and skills are available upon request. 
Skills 
• 
Programming Languages: C#, Java, Scala. 
• 
Hadoop eco system: HDFS, YARN, MapReduce, Spark. 
• 
Analytics: Spark ML for regression and predicting analysis on large data sets. 
• 
Queue System: Kafka, Rabbit, ActiveMQ. 
• 
Database: Oracle 12c, MSSQL, MySQL, Mongo, Elasticsearch (ELK). 
• 
Web Technologies: ASP.Net Core, Spring Boot, Play2. 
• 
Software Architecture: OOP, SOLID Principle, Design Pattern.  
• 
System Design: Microservices, Messaging, ETL, Data warehousing Solutions. 
• 
Methodologies: Scrum, Kanban, CI/CD Pipeline. 
Working Experience 
Software Engineer in Data (06/2018 - Present) 
WIZELINE – HCMC  
• 
Involve in Fintech back-end app which is written by Java8 and Spring Boot. Communicating with Bank 
system to execute payment process. 
• 
Running internal course/knowledge sharing, training and workshop relate to BigData topics (Hadoop & 
Spark). 
Technologies used: Java, MySQL, NodeJs, MongoDb, Hadoop 2.6, Spark, Redis, Docker, ReactJs, RabbitMQ. 
Senior Software Engineer / Data Engineer (06/2017 – 05/2018) 
KITCHEN THINGS – Auckland, New Zealand  
• 
Build E-Commerce Website using .Net Framework, also migrating some component to ASP.Net core. 
• 
Build ETL Data Warehouse with inputs from local stores. Implementing Report for Inventory Management 
using PowerBI. 
• 
Support and maintain EPR System, including optimizing and fixing legacy issues on EDI interfaces with 
other 3rd parties. Reverse Engineering in some cases. 
Technologies used: C#, Java, Restful API, Single Page WebApp. 
Data Engineer (05/2014 – 05/2017) 
SDL – HCMC 
• 
Working closely with Seattle based technical team to ensure expectations of the Product Owner are met, 
including planning, requirement analysis and solution delivery.  
• 
Implementing and maintaining Social Intelligence products which help to understand public opinions by 
combining Data Lake of customer insights with state of the art searching functionality.  
• 
Participating in AWS migration project which migrated more than 150 system services successfully within 3 
months. 
Technologies used: Distributed System, Messaging processing,Python, Hadoop, HBase, Spark, Rabbit, 
Kafka, Reddis, Oozie, Zookeeper.Spark, Scala, Java, C#, ASP.Net MVC, ASP.Net Core, WCF, Spring for .Net, 
Log4Net, Moq, ELK, SQL Server, Selenium, Cucumber. 
Back-End Team Leader (04/2013 - 05/2014) 
Aswig Solutions – HCMC  
• 
Leading a team of 9 developers and QAs to adopt 3rd party's solution to meet business requirements.  
• 
Designing and documenting software solution and architecture to guarantee the sustainability of our 
solutions.  
• 
Performing code review and refactoring.   
Technologies used: ASP.Net MVC, WCF, Autofac, Auto Mapper, Entity Framework, SOAP, Kendo UI, Boostrap. 
Software Engineer (11/2010 – 04/2013) 
Harvey Nash – HCMC  
• 
Working in several projects for Europe and US clients in which my main duties were to build up full features 
from business requirements, and enhance functionalities based on legacy systems.    
• 
Building sophisticated Single Page Application to support multiple screen sizes and wide range of mobile 
devices.  
• 
Implementing and delivering complicated features (including Unit Testing) under high pressure over several 
phases, especially during pre-sales phase.   
• 
Coordinating with both Front End and Back End development.  
Technologies used: ASP.Net MVC, WPF, Silverlight, WCF, WindowForm, Autofac, Unity, Log4Net, Moq, Entity 
Framework, NHibernate, ADO.Net, SQL Server 2010, 2012, DevExpress UI  
Education 
• 
Bachelor of Computer Science – HCMC University of Technology (HUTECH). Graduated 2011. 
• 
Studying Master of Computer Science – VGU. Intake 2018. 
• 
IELTS: 6.5. 
• 
Interested in: Machine Learning, Data Scientist, Scalable System architecture. 
Reference 
Available on request.

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
• Involve in Fintech back-end app which is written by Java8 and Spring Boot. Communicating with Bank system to execute payment process.
• Running internal course/knowledge sharing, training and workshop relate to BigData topics (Hadoop & Spark). Technologies used: Java, MySQL, NodeJs, MongoDb, Hadoop 2.6, Spark, Redis, Docker, ReactJs, RabbitMQ.

- Auckland, New Zealand • Build E-Commerce Website using .Net Framework, also migrating some component to ASP.Net core.
• Build ETL Data Warehouse with inputs from local stores. Implementing Report for Inventory Management using PowerBI. • Support and maintain EPR System, including optimizing and fixing legacy issues on EDI interfaces with other 3rd parties. Reverse Engineering in some cases.
Technologies used: C#, Java, Restful API, Single Page WebApp.

• Working closely with Seattle based technical team to ensure expectations of the Product Owner are met, including planning, requirement analysis and solution delivery.
• Implementing and maintaining Social Intelligence products which help to understand public opinions by combining Data Lake of customer insights with state of the art searching functionality.
• Participating in AWS migration project which migrated more than 150 system services successfully within 3 months.
Technologies used: Distributed System, Messaging processing,Python, Hadoop, HBase, Spark, Rabbit, Kafka, Reddis, Oozie, Zookeeper.Spark, Scala, Java, C#, ASP.Net MVC, ASP.Net Core, WCF, Spring for .Net, Log4Net, Moq, ELK, SQL Server, Selenium, Cucumber.

Leading a team of 9 developers and QAs to adopt 3rd party's solution to meet business requirements.
• Designing and documenting software solution and architecture to guarantee the sustainability of our solutions.
• Performing code review and refactoring.
Technologies used: ASP.Net MVC, WCF, Autofac, Auto Mapper, Entity Framework, SOAP, Kendo UI, Boostrap.

• Working in several projects for Europe and US clients in which my main duties were to build up full features from business requirements, and enhance functionalities based on legacy systems.
• Building sophisticated Single Page Application to support multiple screen sizes and wide range of mobile devices.
• Implementing and delivering complicated features (including Unit Testing) under high pressure over several phases, especially during pre-sales phase.
• Coordinating with both Front End and Back End development.
Technologies used: ASP.Net MVC, WPF, Silverlight, WCF, WindowForm, Autofac, Unity, Log4Net, Moq, Entity Framework, NHibernate, ADO.Net, SQL Server 2010, 2012, DevExpress UI
